name: Violet-Eyes Grey Dragon
text:
"Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Red-Eyes Black Dragon"
Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; activate one of the following effects:
? Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
? Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the current ATK of this card.
"Violet-Eyes Grey Dragon"(s) you control cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.
